name: CreateSolutionCategory
description:
Create a new solution category in Freshservice.

This tool is used to create a new solution category in Freshservice. It should be called when you need to organize solutions by adding a new category in the Freshservice platform.

parameters.name: solution_category_name
parameters.description: The desired name for the new solution category to be created in Freshservice. It should be descriptive and unique.

parameters.name: solution_category_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the solution category to be created in Freshservice.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the solution category

parameters.name: solution_category_description
parameters.description: Provide a description for the solution category.

parameters.name: solution_category_position
parameters.description: The position to display the solution category in Freshservice's category listing.

value_schema.description: The position of the solution category in the category listing. When there are more than 1 categories, then this will determine the position.

parameters.name: is_default_category
parameters.description: Set to true if the category is a default one shipped with the product; such categories cannot have folders added or be renamed or deleted.

value_schema.description: If this is a default category shipped with the product. You cannot add folders to the default category. You cannot delete or rename this category

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the solution category

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the solution category

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The position of the solution category in the category listing. When there are more than 1 categories, then this will determine the position.

value_schema.description: The position of the solution category in the category listing. When there are more than 1 categories, then this will determine the position.

parameters.name: default_category
parameters.description: If this is a default category shipped with the product. You cannot add folders to the default category. You cannot delete or rename this category

value_schema.description: If this is a default category shipped with the product. You cannot add folders to the default category. You cannot delete or rename this category
